text: Nathan King (born 29 August 1970 from the Isle of Wight) is an English musician who has played in three notable bands: Level 42, Frost* and It Bites. He is the younger brother of Level 42's Mark King. Recently, King has played guitar and bass with The Blockheads. King is also a contributor to the 'All About The Bass' series on the Andertons TV YouTube channel. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:English rock guitarists Category:It Bites members Category:Frost* members Category:Level 42 members Category:The Blockheads members Category:Musicians from London Category:21st- century guitarists
title: Nathan King (musician)
